text: Setting up a good base Set up the construction yard. Preferably, located it at the corner of the map you are on. Start building some defenses for your base. For example, use such defenses as Vulcan Cannons, RPG Upgrades, and SAM Upgrades. Deploy any units in front of your base to keep away some intruders. Remember, if against Nod, you will encounter the Cyborg Reapers. Start to build a tech center, Helipads, power plants, and a war factory with other units you prefer. Also, build a Tiberium refinery. Build some units, like a bunch of GDI Light Infantry, and Engineers, Medics, Jump Jet Infantry, and Orca Bombers and Fighters as well. And arm yourself with a firestorm wall! Disabling the enemy Gather a large contingency of tanks in one unit.  Deploy it directly at the enemy's construction yard.  Destroy the enemy's construction yard.  Carefully build your base, your wealth,  and your units. This includes tanks, helicopters and ground forces. Then slowly, but surely, destroy each part of the enemy's base and they will not be able to rebuild it.
